io.elegie.luchess.core.api.explore

Interface GameListQuery

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Query<GameListQueryResult>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GameListQueryImpl, TimedGameListQuery

    public interface GameListQuery
extends Query<GameListQueryResult>
    A query to find a list of games, matching given criteria, including pagination. Criteria should be combined using an AND operator.

    • Method Detail

      • setWhite

        void setWhite(java.lang.String white)
        Parameters:
        white - The name of the White player (case-insensitive).

      • setBlack

        void setBlack(java.lang.String black)
        Parameters:
        black - The name of the Black player (case-insensitive).

      • setMinElo

        void setMinElo(int elo)
        Parameters:
        elo - The minimum elo ranking of both players (when available).

      • setMoves

        void setMoves(java.util.List<java.lang.String> moves)
        Parameters:
        moves - The moves by which the searched game should start (i.e. their opening moves).

      • setPageStart

        void setPageStart(int pageStart)
        Parameters:
        pageStart - The requested page of games (games are grouped by pages, so as to avoid having too many games in one query). First page is page 1.

      • setPageCount

        void setPageCount(int pageCount)
        Parameters:
        pageCount - The number of games per page.
